tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have been trying to become pregnant for few years with no success. We researched online for many weeks in order to find the best fertility doctor in the area, and we found and choose Iswarya Fertility Clinic Marathalli and Dr.Shalini Maam based on the reviews and her experience. It was not an easy easy task, since we were looking for someone that we could trust. I am writing this review with the hope of helping others that are going thru this struggle. Going back to our story, we knew that she was the one when we had our first consultation. She took her time to explain different options to us. She is very knowledgeable and she has lots of experience, but best of all that she truly cares about her patients. I have never felt that I was just another patient for her. She made us confident about being successful on this journey. We always felt excited to go to appointments because we knew we were getting closer and closer. We followed her advises, listened her opinion and left everything on her hand. We trusted her very much because she made us believe! After almost 6 years with various of treatments, we are now expecting our first baby. I am currently 2 months pregnant, and I graduated from this clinic with tears.There are not enough words to express our gratitude to Dr.Shalini Maam, Dr.Supriya, Nurse-Mahalakshmi & Roopa, Receptionist-Swarna & Sahana and whole team .We will never forget, and always remember this journey. We are very happy that we made the best decision, and never gave up. Thank you Dr. Shalini Maam You are our Hero!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Fertilization,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: Greetings to One & All.. We have had a very pleasant experience at Iswarya Fertility Center. After our initial review for choosing the right clinic, we finalized Iswarya Fertility Center. Since the time we started our consultation with Dr. Shalini.K.Mishra & Dr. Supriya, we gained the confidence on our pursuit to have a baby. Dr. Shalini Mishra & Dr. Supriya has been a very objective doctor who does exactly what needs to be done, without any unnecessary deviations. Be it the pleasant interactions, objective treatment, excellent medication, Dr. Shalini Mishra not just cared for us, but provided right guidance without any ambiguity. I sincerely thank her for bringing the positive change & addition in our lives. Iswarya Fertility Center as a clinic has also set a high bench mark ‚Äì the sisters here are very supportive and caring, front-office is very cordial, lab consultant is very objective, support staff are very friendly as well. One would not find such a composed establishment or experience often. As its said, best references can be from those who have had experience of the place/service ‚Äì we standby to provide a pleasant reference to Iswarya Fertility Center.. We wish all the very best for Dr. Shalini & Dr. Supriya for their future endeavorsüòäüòäüòäüòä‚Ä¶We thank Iswarya Fertility Center from our bottom of heartüòäüòäüòä‚Ä¶Thank you..

I truly impressed the way Doctor and staff follow ups about Patients.

My 8 years wait come true with Ishwarya

review: After 4 years of infertility, visited to Ishwarya Fertility. Center after lot of investigation on internet . We have undergone treatment under the supervision of Dr.Shalini Mishra garu. She listens to our problems and understand the root cause, provides excellent treatment with full of dedication. Iam sure that your search ends here.The services, staff is good.Having Dr Shalini mam, consulting her in our infertility journey is a great boon for us. My dream is fulfilled through her.I would highly recommend Dr Shalini Mishra and Ishwarya Fertility Center for the Infertility treatment. Thank you Shalini mam for making our dream come true

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Greetings to One and All..Am very glad to share my Feedback..Dr.Shalini Mishra Madamnis a great Docotor! she's very understanding and listen our concerns..she takes time with patients to help then with their health issues and giving proper medications and suggestions in well manner.My Experience with Madam and Staff is Awesome,Now My wife conceived with Twins and am very happy to share this feedback now...I Strongly Recommending Dr.Shalini Mam and IFCM center for who are looking for good specialists and experts...Thanks Madam for everything.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
Doctor Shalini Mishra is very understanding and remembers even the little things that we say, and that made us feel really comfortable when we consulted her. We had to undergo In Vitro Fertilization, and with her, we felt that we were in safe hands. She explained the process well, and guided us throughout the journey.
Thank you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Shalini is an extremely committed person. She‚Äôs very patient in making us understanding medical norms. She‚Äôs been a good support throughout my fertility treatment. I owe my utmost gratitude towards you Doctor. Thanks for everything that you have done for me‚Ä¶. Rashmi Thorath.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: hi, im based in Delhi and have consulted Dr. Shalini over Practo only several times for her 2nd opinion on various issues which were being advised by our gynae here in Delhi.i found her extreamly patient with all my questions and gave me proper advice.had i been in nearby vicinity i would definitely have visited her in person and got myself treated.hope it helps others!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),In-Vitro Fertilization (IVF),
review: We had a very good experience with doctor Shalini. She looks strict but she is really an awesome person to interact. She listens to you very well and treat accordingly. Our IVF was successful only because of her knowledge and efforts. The cost of ivf is very economic compared to other places in Bangalore. The success rate is very high. Dr Shalini Mishra is very talented and I highly recommend her for all infertility issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Am very glad to share my experience with Dr.Shalini mam.
After surfing a lot of things we found Iswarya, we entered with lots of confusion, but mam gave us confidence in our first meeting and she cleared all our doubts with patience. The way she responded to us is awesome and treated us with love and care. 
She is very knowledgeable and remembers the patient's history clearly. She clearly explained all the procedures for the treatment. 
Because of her positivity, she made me feel very confident in my treatment and I got success in my first attempt.
Because of her blessings and treatment, now am in the third month of pregnancy.  There is no words to express my gratitude to words her . I can't  forgot her in my entire life .we are seeing her like a god in our life.
Thanks a lot mam.
reply_text: Thank you so much dear it means a lot but it‚Äôs both of us who have worked together hard for this journey . We must thank GOD who helped us in this journey

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: I am Glad and Luky to say that the first door i knocked for my fertility issue is Ishwarya fertility center. Thanks to the expertise and dedication of Dr. Shalini Mam and your entire team, we are now in the 13th week of a successful pregnancy! From our initial consultation to the entire treatment journey, Dr. Shalini Mam exhibited a level of professionalism that immediately instilled confidence in me. Her ability to thoroughly explain the complexities of infertility, the available treatment options, and their potential outcomes helped me understand the process and make informed decisions.The results speak for themselves, and I am overjoyed to share that, thanks to your expertise and guidance, my infertility struggle has come to a successful conclusion. The gift of parenthood that you have helped me achieve is beyond words, and I will forever be grateful to Dr. Shalini Mam for making my dreams come true.
reply_text: Thank you so much God bless

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
We have been consulting many gynecologist from past 4 to 5 years, which did not yield any result.  Finally we got to know about Dr. Shalini Mishra (ISWARYA FERTILITY CENTER) through some friends and also read many positive comments/reviews as well.  Finally we decided to try for one last time. And yes, we got the result. All credits to Dr. Shalini Mishra. We were very much fortunate to have her as our doctor. Ma‚Äôam, you will always remain special in our life. Thank you so much. 

Regards,
Bindu/Nithin

review: We are married since 8 years attended so many fertility centres before approaching Dr Shalini ,being a case of low reserve we just went directly for ivf with doctor's advice knowing the fact of high failure rate .Doctor counselled us for embryo pooling and we just went ahead with doctor's advice currently with good support of Dr Shalini and Gods grace i am pregnant with Twins.Thanks mam for your guidance

Much recommended and All the best!
